bibl.title: An Early Conservation Register of Work Undertaken on Egyptian Papyri for the British Museum, 1838-1842.
bibl.note: The manuscript is ascribed to J. HOGARTH. The hand is similar to that of Samuel BIRCH.

bibl.title: Il rotolo librario: fabbricazione, restauro, organizzazione interna

bibl.seg: QUIRKE Stephen, An Early Conservation Register of Work Undertaken on Egyptian Papyri for the British Museum, 1838-1842.
Mario CAPASSO (a cura di), Il rotolo librario: fabbricazione, restauro, organizzazione interna = Papyrologica Lupiensia. 3 (Lecce, 1994) pp. 163-186, 3 pll.
The manuscript is ascribed to J. HOGARTH. The hand is similar to that of Samuel BIRCH.
